alert.note: Alert for Northern Lycoming; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan; Tioga (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 5:54PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL LYCOMING...NORTHWESTERN SULLIVAN AND SOUTHEASTERN TIOGA COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM EDT... At 554 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Montoursville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Montoursville, Kettle Creek Gorge, Cogan Station, Ralston, Ogdensburg, Trout Run, Lincoln Falls, Barbours, Shunk, Loyalsockville, Forksville, Hillsgrove and Williamsport Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central Pennsylvania.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lycoming; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan; Tioga
